entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Orangeville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mono Centre 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -12.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -15.3°C
Wind: WSW 54 km/h gust 82 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 8 this evening then steady.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 8 this evening then steady. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Blowing snow in the evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
